adjectives.description: niggerish (comparative more niggerish, superlative most niggerish)

entries.meaning: (derogatory, offensive, ethnic slur, vulgar) Like or characteristic of a nigger.
examples: So when I say that my Auntie's piety was not of the niggerish kind...

entries.meaning: (derogatory, offensive, vulgar, ethnic slur, colloquial, chiefly US) African-American Vernacular English.
